SELECT
FROM `dj_member_collect` c INNER JOIN dj_house h ON h.id = c.house_id where c.data_status = 0 and c.condition_type = 0
AND c.member_id = #{memberId}
ORDER BY c.create_date DESC

FROM `dj_member_collect` c INNER JOIN dj_changsha.dj_basics_product p ON p.id = c.house_id where c.data_status = 0 and c.condition_type = 1

ORDER BY c.create_date DESC
